Skeleton archer is a monster encountered during Ancient Awakening and in the standard mode of the Ungael combat activity.

During Ancient Awakening their life points are reduced to 70% of the value seen in the standard mode of Ungael combat activity. The player fights them with their expedition party in the tower on Ungael, with two of them appearing in the second, fourth, and fifth waves and one in the sixth, eighth, ninth, and twelfth waves, along with many other monsters.

In the standard mode of the Ungael combat activity two of them appear in the second, fourth, tenth, and eleventh waves, along with many other monsters.
